title: Guest Access and Car Browsing
description: Verify guest users can browse cars by location, date, and category with limited details and are prompted to sign up when trying to book.

steps.description: Launch the app as a guest user without signing in
Navigate to car browsing section
Filter cars by location, date range, and category
Verify that cars are displayed with limited details (no booking or host contact info)
Attempt to initiate a booking on a selected car
Verify user is prompted to sign up or log in before proceeding

title: User Sign Up via Social Login and Email Verification
description: Ensure customers can sign up using Google and Apple social logins and that email verification gating is enforced before booking.

steps.description: Open the sign-up screen
Sign up with a valid Google account
User account is created and email verification prompt is displayed
Attempt to book a car without verifying email
Booking is blocked until email verification is complete
Repeat sign up process using Apple login and verify same gating

title: Full Online Booking Payment Flow
description: Verify customer can book a car with full online payment via Stripe and Paymob with multi-currency support and receive booking confirmation.

steps.description: Sign in as a verified customer
Search for a car with valid availability
Select booking dates using the calendar widget
Proceed to payment screen, choose full payment option
Make payment with valid Stripe payment details in local currency
Payment is processed successfully, booking status is confirmed
Booking appears in customer's booking history

title: Partial Payment (Deposit) Booking Flow and Refund Policy
description: Ensure customer can pay 20% deposit online via supported payment methods and the remaining amount on pickup; confirm refund behavior follows cancellation policy.

steps.description: Sign in as verified customer
Select car and booking dates
Choose 20% deposit payment option at checkout
Complete online deposit payment
Booking status reflects deposit paid and balance due on pickup
Cancel booking within eligible refund period
Partial refund is processed according to refund policy
Cancel booking outside refund window
No refund is issued as per policy

title: Host Application, Approval and Car Listing Management
description: Validate that hosts can apply for approval, get approved by admin, then list cars with image uploads, availability calendar management, and modify listings.

steps.description: Sign up and apply as host
Host application is submitted and visible to admin
Admin approves host via admin panel
Host receives approval notification and can access host dashboard
Host adds a new car listing including uploading multiple photos
Images upload successfully and car appears in host inventory
Host sets availability calendar for the new car
Availability dates are saved and reflected in booking system
Host modifies car details and verifies changes
Updated car details are saved and shown accurately

title: Admin Moderation: Approve Cars, Host Approval, Review Moderation, Dispute Resolution
description: Test admin capabilities to approve new host applications, car listings, moderate user reviews, and resolve disputes or cancellations.

steps.description: Sign in as admin
Review pending host applications and approve/reject
Approved hosts can list cars; rejected hosts cannot
Review pending car listings and approve/reject
Only approved cars become searchable and bookable
Review user-submitted reviews flagged for moderation
Approve or delete inappropriate reviews
Review visibility updates correctly
Access dispute management dashboard
Resolve a sample dispute and verify resolution updates status

title: Real-Time Chat Messaging and Notifications
description: Verify that customers and hosts can exchange messages in real-time with message persistence and receive timely notifications.

steps.description: Sign in as customer and initiate chat with host
Send a message to the host
Host receives message in real-time and notification
Host replies back
Customer sees reply instantly
Close and reopen chat screen
All chat messages persist and display correctly
Test notification reception when app is in background

title: Favorites System: Add, Remove, and Persist Favorite Cars
description: Ensure users can add cars and hosts to favorites lists, remove them, and data persists between sessions.

steps.description: Sign in as a customer
Save multiple cars and hosts to favorites from browsing and details screens
Favorites list updates and reflects additions immediately
Remove an item from favorites
Item is removed instantly from favorites list
Log out and log back in
Favorites list persists and matches previous session

title: Google Maps Integration and Location-Based Car Search
description: Verify location-based car search works accurately using Google Maps and geolocation APIs to find nearby cars.

steps.description: Open browse by destination screen
Allow location permissions
User location is detected accurately on map
Search for cars nearby using map and filters
Nearby cars are displayed correctly on map and list
Select a car on the map to view details
Correct car details and location appear

title: Offline Mode and Data Synchronization
description: Test that the app gracefully handles offline scenarios with usable cached data and synchronizes updates when connectivity is restored.

steps.description: Launch app with active internet connection and browse several features (cars, favorites, bookings)
Disable network connectivity (go offline)
Previously accessed data is available and usable
Attempt actions that require network (e.g. new booking)
App displays friendly offline error messages and prevents actions
Re-enable network connectivity
Pending changes and data synchronize correctly with backend automatically

title: Document Upload and Verification Workflow
description: Verify users can upload ID, license, and insurance documents, and that verification status gating is enforced for full platform access.

steps.description: Sign in as customer or host
Navigate to document upload section
Upload required documents (ID, driver license, insurance) in accepted formats
Documents are uploaded successfully and visible in list
User cannot complete booking or listing until documents are verified by admin
Admin approves verification via admin panel
User gains full access to booking or hosting capabilities post-verification

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcements
description: Ensure that guests, customers, hosts, and admins can only access features authorized for their role with secure token enforcement.

steps.description: Log in as guest; try to access restricted features like booking or host dashboard
Access is denied or redirected to sign up/login
Log in as customer; try to access host dashboard or admin panel
Access is denied with proper error or redirect
Log in as host; verify access to host dashboard features; deny admin-only features
Host can manage cars/bookings but cannot access admin moderation tools
Log in as admin; verify access to all platform features including moderation
Admin has full access with no unauthorized restriction

title: Security: ID Verification and Encrypted Data Storage
description: Verify that sensitive user data including uploaded documents and authentication tokens are stored encrypted and that ID verification steps protect rental integrity.

steps.description: Upload ID verification documents
Documents are encrypted on device and while transmitted to backend
Inspect storage to confirm no sensitive info stored in plain text
Test access with invalid or expired authentication tokens
Access is denied and token refresh or re-authentication is enforced

title: Multi-Currency Pricing and Payment Conversion Accuracy
description: Ensure pricing and payments reflect correct currency based on user location with accurate real-time conversion rates applied across Stripe and Paymob integrations.

steps.description: Simulate user location in Algeria and browse car pricing
Prices display in Algerian Dinar accurately
Make payment with Stripe using local currency
Payment is processed correctly without rounding errors
Repeat flow with user location in France and payment via Paymob
Currency conversions and payments process correctly

title: UI Verification for Filters and Accessibility Features
description: Verify UI elements such as filters, floating content blocks, and voice search operate correctly across multiple devices and platforms, meeting accessibility standards.

steps.description: Open search screen and apply multiple filters
Filter UI updates correctly and results change accordingly
Use voice search to find cars
Voice input triggers correct search results
Test floating content blocks for consistency in portrait and landscape modes
UI maintains clean, user-friendly layout without overlap or clipping
Verify accessibility features such as screen reader support and keyboard navigation
App is usable by users requiring assistive technologies
